bibl.title: A Greek Register from Pathyris' Notarial Office. Loans and Sales from the Pathyrite and Latopolite Nomes.
bibl.note: Pathyris, 111-110 BC. - Part I. Introduction: 1. Survey of the texts; - 2. Composition and date of the register; - 3. Types of contracts; - 4. Mistakes, omissions and abbreviations; - 5. Who went to the notary's office of Pathyris?; - 6. Prosopographical data; - 7. Topographical data. - Part II. Text edition: Fragment A; - Fragment B; - Fragment C; - Fragment D.
bibl.seg: VANDORPE Katelijn, A Greek Register from Pathyris' Notarial Office. Loans and Sales from the Pathyrite and Latopolite Nomes.
ZPE 150 (2004) pp. 161-186, 2 figg. et pll. III-VII.
